title: The Beach is Fun! - 4
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>Ah, Ai-san, where have you been?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Sorry, sorry~. One of the beach houses looked like they couldn’t handle how crowded they were, so I was helping them out a little.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Huh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>My family runs a monja shop, so I’m pretty used to handling customers~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>No, that’s not what I was surprised about... Ai-san, you really know how to make friends with anyone quickly.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ahaha, it is what I’m good at, after all~. Anyway, Dia, they gave me this okonomiyaki for helping them out! Let’s share it~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Wow, all that seafood looks delicious!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>And after we eat it, our schools will play each other in beach volleyball!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Ura High won’t lose.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Nijigaku won’t lose either~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
